column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
column21: Plunging Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.
column167: Press: #Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.
column168: Hold: Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.
column346: Cat's Tail Secret Menu: Characters shielded by Icy Paws have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.
column347: Drunkards' Farce: Opponents who enter the AoE of Signature Mix have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.
column348: A Lingering Flavor: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.
column349: Shaken, Not Purred: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%. Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.
column350: A—Another Round?: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column351: Wine Industry Slayer: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%
column352: Double Shot, On The Rocks: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column353: Cat's Tail Closing Time: Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts: • Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%. • Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.
